mapper.select: SELECT std.st_id,std.st_image,std.st_name, std.st_gender,std.st_parent_name,std.st_contact, cls.cls_desc,tch.tch_name,tch.tch_contact FROM tb_student std left join c_st_cls c1 on std.st_id = c1.st_id left join tb_class cls on c1.c_id = cls.cls_id left join tb_teacher on cls.tch_id = tch.tch_id WHERE std.st_id = #{std_id}
